title: Why are Warden skins unavailable????
body: I was so excited when i was going through the Skin Select list when i played {{champion:111}}  yesterday. His Warden skin was finally out! I clicked on the Click To Unlock button to buy it right there, but it said it was unavailable! Then after the match i looked at {{champion:15}}  as well, and her's was unavailable also! Has it not been released, or it there a bug, I wanna know so i can buy Warden Naut immediately!

replies.body: Not everything unlocks at the beginning of the patch - skins are unlocked throughout.
thank God for you i was like where they at because i just updated today so i was like confused.
Thanks. I deserve looking like an idiot for curiosity.
didn't intended that way but it was a bit funny to me, sorry

> [{quoted}](name=EllaRyu69,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=EFyoYvoj,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-15T03:09:02.284+0000)
>
> facepalm*

if you were a new player would you like to be treated like this?
They were announced, but not release. The splash art is there, but you cannot buy them yet.
